characterDescription: Arshqqam's spren declares herself to be a mistspren and that they can choose their forms. That they usually choose a shape like a person, but don't need to do so.

characterDetails.Appearance:
To Adolin, she seems to be made entirely from mist, all save for her face, which hovers on the front of her head in the shape of a porcelain mask. That mask has a kind of twinkling reflection to it, always catching the light. In fact, Adolin could've sworn that from some perspectives it was made of translucent crystal. To him, the spren seems to be female, or at least has a feminine figure and voice.
She wears a vest and trousers, both of which somehow float and encapsulate her body made entirely of white fog. Her hands end in gloves.
characterDetails.Characteristics:
She has a delicate voice that tinkles like cracking glass.
Her mask's lips don't move when she speaks.
characterDetails.Character: She likes to know how minds think.
characterDetails.Notes: Arshqqam's spren has been revealed to be the Stump's spren.
